update user_trade_order
`uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
payment_amount = #{paymentAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
receive_amount = #{receiveAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_trade_order set `uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_amount = #{paymentAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, receive_amount = #{receiveAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, service_charge = #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, payment_card_id = #{paymentCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receive_card_id = #{receiveCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, summary = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_amount = #{billAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, card_balance = #{cardBalance,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, card_last_payment_date = #{cardLastPaymentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, payment_days = #{paymentDays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT sum(payment_amount) as payment_amount FROM user_trade_order WHERE type = 1 AND `status` = 1 AND uid = #{uid}
SELECT count(*) AS num FROM user_trade_order WHERE type = 1 AND `status` >= 0 AND uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND DATE_FORMAT( card_last_payment_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )

SELECT IFNULL(sum(payment_amount),0) AS payment_amount FROM user_trade_order WHERE type = 1 AND `status` >=0 AND uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND DATE_FORMAT( card_last_payment_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )

select
from user_trade_order where type=#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by create_time asc

select count(1) from user_trade_order where uid=#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND payment_card_id=#{paymentCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND status in (-1,-2) AND DATE_FORMAT( card_last_payment_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )
